articles.title: Henlo World
articles.contents:
Henlo! My name is Fajar Nugroho, thanks for visiting my site. I currently work as a Marketing Analyst at Rakamin Academy a Start Up Education Technology based in Jakarta, Indonesia. I enjoy using R adn Python since join Bootcamp Data Science at Algoritma Data Science School.  Previously, I completed my Bachelor of Fisheries Science at Universitas Gadjah Mada in August 2018. I enjoy writing about things I‚Äôm working on and try to share some interesting things I discover on my blog.
Feel free to get in touch if any of the posts catch your interest!
Shiny Apps
Need a dashboard for your business?  I recommend develop it with Shiny Apps, because I can develop it for you !
